page.title: 14KINGSCLERE HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The{Health Centre}is in the centre of Kingsclere. It has lots of activities and several people work there. There are a dentist, two doctors, nurses and receptionists. At the back there is a meeting room where the{Red Cross}meet. Sometimes we can borrow equipment from them. There is a very nice waiting- room with a fish tank, and books and magazines for people to read. There is also a playroom for young children. The Health Centre was built in 1980 on land which used to hold part of Kingsclere School.People go there to visit their doctor or dentist, to receive treatment from a nurse, and the district nurses and health visitors keep in touch with their patients at the centre. 4,600 people are registered there, some from other villages.There are clinics for speech therapy, ante-natal care and chiropody
